name: Save The Flock
description:
My first ever game - made for the GMTK Game Jam 2021!

The goal is to get to the end of each level with as much of your flock left as possible. The red boid will follow your cursor a little more strictly than the others, and anyone who strays too far from the flock led by the red boid will sadly never rejoin your journey.

I didn't have time for a proper scoring system so go by the size of the remaining flock with time as a tiebreaker if you're going for a high score!
